title: In case of partial/extensive structural repairs of buildings owned by Government/Semi Government organizations/Municipal Corporation/B
clause_text: In case of partial/extensive structural repairs of buildings owned by Government/Semi Government organizations/Municipal Corporation/B.E.S.T. Undertaking/Government-Semi Government Undertakings, approval of the Head of department/Competent Authority of Concerned organization shall be sufficient. Structural Audit as per the requirement of MCGM and compliance thereof shall have to be observed by the concerned organization/Authority.
